info.title: E-Commerce API Documentation
info.description: API endpoints for the Graduation Project

get.summary: Get all addresses for the authenticated user

post.summary: Create a new address for the authenticated user

put.summary: Update an existing address for the authenticated user

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: ID of the address to update

403.description: Forbidden (if the address does not belong to the user)

delete.summary: Delete an address for the authenticated user

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: ID of the address to delete

403.description: Forbidden (if the address does not belong to the user)

message.example: User registered successfully. Please check your email to verify.

post.summary: Log in an existing user and receive a Sanctum token
Log out user and invalidate the current token

get.summary: Get authenticated user's profile and addresses

200.description: User profile data with loaded addresses

put.summary: Update authenticated user's profile (name and/or email).

requestBody.description: User data to update (fields are optional)

delete.summary: Delete the authenticated user's account and all associated tokens

message.example: The provided current password does not match your password.

ErrorValidation.title: Validation Error
ErrorValidation.description: Standard response for 422 Unprocessable Entity due to validation failures

items.example: The email has already been taken.

ErrorValidationAuth.title: Authentication Validation Error
ErrorValidationAuth.description: Validation error response for authentication endpoints (register, login)

items.example: The email has already been taken.
The password must be at least 8 characters.

ErrorValidationUser.title: User Profile Validation Error
ErrorValidationUser.description: Validation error response for user profile endpoints (update profile, change password)

items.example: The name field must not exceed 255 characters.
The email must be a valid email address.
The current password field is required.
The password must be at least 8 characters.

ErrorValidationAddress.title: Address Validation Error
ErrorValidationAddress.description: Validation error response for address endpoints (create, update address)

items.example: The street must not exceed 255 characters.
The phone numbers field must be an array with at least 1 item.
Each phone number must not exceed 13 characters.

message.example: No query results for model [App\\Models\\ModelName] ID.

bearerAuth.description: Enter your Sanctum token in the format: Bearer {token}
